reinoculation 再接种reiterated genes 重复基因reiterated sequences 重复序列

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the senses 'do (an action) repeatedly'): from Latin reiterat- 'gone over again', from the verb reiterare, from re- 'again' + iterare 'do a second time'

entry.tran: （通常为了强调）重复讲，反复说，重申
entry.def: If you reiterate something, you say it again, usually in order to emphasize it.

example.ex: He reiterated his opposition to the creation of a central bank...
example.tran: 他重申了自己反对成立央行的立场。

example.ex: I want to reiterate that our conventional weapons are superior.
example.tran: 我要再次重申，我们的常规武器是一流的。

means.word_mean: 1. to say, state, or perform again;

auth_sentence.content: To reiterate, Evolution proceeds very gradually in small steps.
auth_sentence.res_content: To reiterate, Evolution proceeds very gradually in small steps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To reiterate, Evolution proceeds very gradually in small steps.

auth_sentence.content: So, just to reiterate: We set the rules.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, just to reiterate: We set the rules.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, just to reiterate: We set the rules.

auth_sentence.content: I strongly reiterate that I am not racist or homophobic.
auth_sentence.res_content: I strongly reiterate that I am not racist or homophobic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I strongly reiterate that I am not racist or homophobic.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的

re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行

re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回

re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排

re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

sentences.en: The boy do not move though the teacher reiterate her command.
sentences.cn: 虽然教师一再命令，但这孩子动都不动。

sentences.en: Let me reiterate that we have absolutely no plan to increase taxation.
sentences.cn: 让我再一次重申我们绝对没有增税的计划。
